sentences.en: As her land investments grew in amount and number, she became insanely niggardly in personal expenditure.
sentences.cn: 她的地产投资愈大愈多, 她在个人用钱方面就愈是扣斤算两,拼命节省.

sentences.en: Be not niggardly of what costs thee nothing , as courtesy , counsel, & countenance.
sentences.cn: 不必花钱的东西--礼貌, 忠告 和 鼓动---要舍得给予.

sentences.en: Don't be niggardly; you can afford to share your good fortune.
sentences.cn: 别小气, 你能过得起好日子.

sentences.en: Forced by hunger, he worked for the most niggardly pay.
sentences.cn: 为饥饿所迫, 他为极少的工资而工作.

sentences.en: Forced by hunger, I worked for niggardly pay.
sentences.cn: 为饥饿所迫, 我为极少的工资而工作.

sentences.en: He is niggardly with his money.
He is not niggardly of praise.
He was made to be niggardly and reckless.
sentences.cn: 他既嗜钱如命,又挥金如土.

sentences.en: I don't want to seem niggardly.
sentences.cn: 我不愿让人家认为我很小气.

sentences.en: It'seems he a litter niggardly, but if a woman do such action may reasonable.
sentences.cn: 那么似乎就有点小气了, 但是如果是女士做的话,就情有可原.

sentences.en: Nice calculation is a niggardly thing.
sentences.cn: 精打细算是一件吝啬的事.

sentences.en: Officials say the EU, which is supposed to provide most of the food needs, is being particularly niggardly.
sentences.cn: 官员们说应该提供所需的大部分食品的欧盟现在特别小气。

sentences.en: You must sacrifice your poor, squawking, niggardly individuality.
sentences.cn: 你一定得牺牲你那无聊地爱好大声诉苦和心地狭窄的个性.

words.tran_cn: 拘泥小节；为琐事费时；挑剔

trans.tran_cn: 吝啬的，小气的，不大度的，（钱数）不值钱的
trans.tran_en: unwilling to spend money or be generous
